entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:49 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
